===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# A [[unit]] of [[measurement]].
## The ''[[zhang]]'', a [[traditional]] [[Chinese]] [[unit]] of [[length]] [[equal]] to 10 [[chi]] ({{zh-l|*尺}})
## The [[mainland China|mainland]] ''[[zhang]]'', a [[unit]] of [[length]] [[standardize]]d in 1984 as 3 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>3</sub> [[meter]]s.
## The [[Taiwanese]] ''[[zhang]]'', a [[unit]] of [[length]] [[standardize]]d as 3 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>33</sub> [[meter]]s, [[identical]] to the [[Japanese]] [[jō]].
## The [[Hong Kong]] ''jeuhng'', [[standardize]]d as 3.71475 [[meter]]s.
# to [[survey]] (land); to [[measure]]
# [[gentleman]]; [[man]]; [[husband]]
#: {{zh-x|丈夫|husband}}

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|mainland zhang}} {{zh-l|市丈}}

==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
From {{etyl|zh|ja}} {{m|zh|丈|tr=zhang}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|じょう|hhira=ぢやう}}

# [[jō]], a [[traditional]] [[Japanese]] [[unit]] of [[length]] [[based]] on 10 [[shaku]], [[standardize]]d as [[equal]] to 3 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>33</sub> [[meter]]s.

===Etymology 2===
/take<small>2</small>/: [takye] → [take]. Cognate with {{m|ja|高|tr=taka||height}}, {{m|ja|高い|tr=takai||high}}, and {{m|ja|長ける|tr=takeru||to be high}}.

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|長}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|たけ}}

# [[height]]
#* {{RQ:Utsubo Monogatari|Toshikage}}
#*: [...] いひ教ふる事もなくておほしたつるに、年にもあはず、'''丈'''たかく心かしこし。

====Particle====
{{ja-pos|particle|だけ}}

# [[only]], [[limit]]
#: {{ja-usex|ローマ字'''だけ'''の辞書。|^ローマじ '''だけ''' の じしょ。|A rōmaji-'''only''' dictionary.}}
#: {{ja-usex|寝たい'''だけ'''寝ていい。|^ねたい '''だけ''' ねて い.い。|You can sleep '''as much as''' you want.}}

=====Usage notes=====
* The Kanji spelling '''丈''' is rarely used.
